comment: I love having the TripAdvisor app on my phone. With all the fantastic reviews and photos from other travelers like me, TA makes it a breeze to find the perfect hotel, restaurant, or local attraction. I honestly don't know where I would be without this app. Also, writing my own reviews is a fun and enjoyable way of helping to share my own experiences in the world. 5 stars!!!

author: Dusty Gutsell
comment: Not going to give 5 stars as it doesn't give the right month or year when writing a review. I wrote one recently using the app and it said I wrote it last year! The app is however easy to use so that's why the 3 stars.

author: Kevin Tunney
comment: Perfect app if you love traveling and doing tours or other activities on trips

author: Niladri Banerjee
comment: This app is fantastic for hotel booking . Flight booking has some challenges.

author: tree house members of Stephen raj 6a
comment: I'm a youtuber having 100 million subscribers. And I rate u five stars for this wonderful app

author: Jim Penfold
comment: Another weapon in my arsenal of vacation apps. Indispensable for real feedback from fellow travelers.

author: Bob Hope
comment: Used to love TripAdvisor but the search is just rubbish now

author: Juli Robinson
comment: This app is very helpful for planning our trips and managing all necessary confirmations in one place.

author: Zahadul Karim Chowdhury
comment: Excellent User friendly

author: Bijay Acharya
comment: Dami xa yr

author: Amjat Tamboli
comment: Nice app

author: Ali Hirad
comment: It is one of a kind
Love it
Good app...

author: Simon Martin
comment: I have been to many times to The Arkles pub in Anfield and it's after booking into my accommodation I go straight to the Arkles pub. Staff,  Inc landlord always give me a warm welcome and when I leave I get a fond farewell till my next visit.. I can't praise the pub, service,  staff etc enough. .  Full credit to your chain of Pubs. Keep it up.  Simon Martin

author: Sam Freeman
comment: Love TripAdvisor and use the website lots, downloaded the app for the ability to have offline cities stored on it, and this feature doesn't work at all. Let's you download the city, but as soon as you are offline there is no functionality. This either needs fixing quickly or the description on the app updating!

author: Andrew Haywood
comment: I'm uninstalling TripAdvisor entirely because of unnecessary and intrusive tracking. After googling the time in Houston the TripAdvisor app starts sending notifications trying to sell me hotels in Houston. I realise that tracking is now a fact of life but I still do not appreciate this kind of creepy spying with notifications being pushed to my phone.

author: Cian Prendiville
comment: Spent weeks using app, saving things I wanted to see. Now as soon as I'm on holidays it doesn't work offline despite having downloaded the city. So I can't access my saves or anything offline, making it very difficult and losing hours of work.

author: Maarten Stolker
comment: Good travel app, missing 'bar' as easy category. Sometimes not practical in actual use and weird search results in wrong order. But still like it a lot.

author: Rafal Karwacki
comment: The business management is a joke, you can't event set proper opening and closing times as neither 1am, 01, 1:00 nor 01:00 is a valid time according to TripAdvisor! Doesn't remember your credentials so you need to put in your email address and password every single time. You cannot update a listing due to some glitch that will let you delete text but won't let you type.  On top of this, TripAdvisor as a concept is a joke. Watch a documentary about a guy who became number 1 restaurant in the whole of London even though he didn't even have a restaurant and not one single customer set foot in his business. Puts things in perspective.

author: Seana Farrington
comment: I use this app mainly to check out restaurants when I am in new places. It has saved me from some possibly dodgy hotels too. I find the reviews very reliable.
Neither the website or app are user friendly. I don't get why searching is so difficult.

author: Charles Pike
comment: Whenever we plan a vacation, we almost always use Tripadvisor. Reviews from regular people (not solely travel experts), and plenty of good information from the experts.

author: Peter D
comment: Always use this app,  not just to post bad but the good as well. Still going to keep everyone up to date on travels as all reviews in my opinion help the traveller

author: Eric Campbell
comment: Love this app! Anytime I'm going to a new place, I open up the app to find hotels,  restaurants, and things to do and see. It's extremely helpful, and for the most part, very accurate!

author: Tina Jackson
comment: It's great for reviews however not being able to see more than a few photos is very disappointing- there is clearly a bug that needs fixing

author: Shalini Rajendren
comment: This app is the app for people who want to explore new places.. whatever u need to know is there..  when i go to a new place, i feel lost without tripadvisor.. its that good.. love it

author: Vaibhav Shingade
comment: Each time i try to write review the application fails amd brings me on home page... Tried to restart my mobile but again the app fails.

author: David Chikvashvili
comment: Complicated to write a review. Took me 10 minutes to register (sign in with FB didn't work) and then to find it. Not intuitive

author: Liam Hodder
comment: A whole travel agent in your pocket! Perfect for the lazy explorer. Simply love it. Chapeaux to everyone involved. You're all doing a terrific job. Mo sheacht ngraidhn déag sibh.
This app is worse than the trip advisor website, I remember an old version that was simple and cleanly laid out. This is truly rubbish.
I can't use the wrb site. They force you to download the app even if you don't want... its annoying

author: Arslan Butt
comment: Its a great app . Really great and helpful . It has made my travelling much much easier .. Great job guys .. Keep it up 👍👍👍

author: Megan Leitem
comment: It has been a year since I've used this app. I needed to update, which I did. Still says I need to update but Google Play just says open and the app says update so I get nowhere...Update: cleared cache and works now.

author: Laura Banks
comment: I can't believe I just downloaded this now!! Very handy to find highly rated restaurants nearby and to figure out what key things to see in a city. I especially love the guides made by TA users.

author: EduardShagal
comment: Offline maps not working. Just showing nothing. Huge company delivering an app, the main feature of which does not work, just awful.

author: Stacy Bruss
comment: I wanted to use this for my trip to Italy, however when I try to use the offline features, the app just returns me to the main screen and tells me it needs internet connection. Why do I have over a GB of content downloaded on my phone if I can't access it?
I visited last month and it was osm experience and make me happy and delicious food and great service please visit app and try it

author: Thomas Kaye
comment: Can only view approx 10 photos in each section despite there being 1000's. Travel trolley also causes crashes.  doesn't show non English reviews.... poor

author: Kris Albert
comment: App is great but have not been able to access full gallery of pictures on any of my mobile devices, including smartphones and tablets . Makes it quite a bit less functional from the full site. Fix this!
